    def close_layer(self):
        flag = False
        if len(self.common.layer_divs) > 0:  # 弹出弹窗
            for layer_shade in self.common.layer_shades:
                self.common.execute_script('arguments[0].click()', layer_shade)  # 关闭弹窗
            flag = True
